languages.text: "Довольно о делах, Хейнрикс. Когда-то вы обещали мне интересную беседу — и явно не ту, которую мы сейчас с вами ведем".

traits.locale_text: "Довольно о делах, Хейнрикс. Когда-то вы обещали мне интересную беседу — и явно не ту, которую мы сейчас с вами ведем".

languages.text: "Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."
languages.original_text: "Довольно о делах, Хейнрикс. Когда-то вы обещали мне интересную беседу — и явно не ту, которую мы сейчас с вами ведем".

traits.locale_text: "Let us depart from matters of business, Heinrix. You once promised me an interesting conversation — and this clearly was not what you had in mind when you did."
"Let us depart from matters of business, Heinrix. You once promised me an interesting conversation — and this clearly was not what you had in mind when you did."
"Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."
"Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."
"Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."
"Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."

languages.text: « Assez parlé affaires, Heinrix. Vous m'avez promis une conversation passionnante et j'ose espérer que ce n'était pas ce que vous aviez en tête. »
languages.original_text: "Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."

traits.locale_text: « Assez parlé affaires, Heinrix. Vous m'avez promis une conversation passionnante et j'ose espérer que ce n'était pas ce que vous aviez en tête. »

languages.text: “咱们还是先别谈公事了，海因里希。你答应过我，说要与我进行一场愉快的谈话。像现在这样的谈话，恐怕算不上愉快吧？”
languages.original_text: "Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."

traits.locale_text: “咱们还是先别谈公事了，海因里希。你答应过我，说要与我进行一场愉快的谈话。像现在这样的谈话，恐怕算不上愉快吧？”

languages.text: "Lassen wir die geschäftlichen Dinge hinter uns, Heinrix. Ihr habt einmal versprochen, mich mit packender Konversation zu unterhalten — gewiss hattet Ihr dabei nicht das im Sinne."
languages.original_text: "Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."

traits.locale_text: "Lassen wir die geschäftlichen Dinge hinter uns, Heinrix. Ihr habt einmal versprochen, mich mit packender Konversation zu unterhalten — gewiss hattet Ihr dabei nicht das im Sinne."

languages.text: «Dejemos de lado los asuntos de negocios, Heinrix. Una vez me prometió que tendríamos una conversación interesante, seguro que no se refería a esto».
languages.original_text: "Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."

traits.locale_text: «Dejemos de lado los asuntos de negocios, Heinrix. Una vez me prometió que tendríamos una conversación interesante, seguro que no se refería a esto».

languages.text: 「仕事の話はやめよう、ハインリックス。以前、魅了する会話で楽しませると言っていたな…いや、これは期待していた会話ではない」
languages.original_text: "Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."

traits.locale_text: 「仕事の話はやめよう、ハインリックス。以前、魅了する会話で楽しませると言っていたな…いや、これは期待していた会話ではない」

languages.text: "İş meselelerini bir kenara koyalım Heinrix. Bana güzel muhabbetler edeceğimizin sözünü vermiştin. İlginçten kastın bu değildi herhâlde."
languages.original_text: "Let us depart from business matters, Heinrix. You once promised to entertain me with a compelling conversation — surely, this is not what you had in mind."

traits.locale_text: "İş meselelerini bir kenara koyalım Heinrix. Bana ilginç bir sohbet konusuyla hoş vakit geçirteceğinin sözünü vermiştin, eminim aklındaki şey bu değildi."
